R

readData() - Method in class at.ac.tuwien.ict.andropicar.rmcs.network.ServerConnection
Reads a maximum of 500 bytes from the Sockets InputStream, converts it into a String, and returns it.
If an IOException occurs, the connection is closed and a new connection to the TCP-Server is established, if possible.

RMCSComponentManager - Class in at.ac.tuwien.ict.andropicar.rmcs.stm32
The central manager that handles all incoming IData and, depending on the type of data, forwards it to the corresponding SensorDataListeners and RMCSControlComponents.
All RMCSControlComponents have to register themselves with the RMCSComponentManager in order to get updated about new IControlData.
All SensorDataListeners have to register themselves with the RMCSComponentManager in order to get updated about new SensorData.
RMCSComponentManager(LinkedBlockingQueue<IData>) - Constructor for class at.ac.tuwien.ict.andropicar.rmcs.stm32.RMCSComponentManager

The RMCSSensorComponent-class is a base-class for all components of the RMCS, that are able to publish SensorData on the RMCS.

run() - Method in class at.ac.tuwien.ict.andropicar.rmcs.gamepad.GamepadConnection
 
run() - Method in class at.ac.tuwien.ict.andropicar.rmcs.network.ServerConnection
Tries to establish a connection with the TCP-Server until it is successful.
Registers this car on the TCP-Server and sends a list of the cars properties.
Continuously processes incoming data and sends the cars sensor-data to the TCP-Server.
If the connection to the TCP-Server is lost at some point, the method will immediately try to reestablish it.
run() - Method in class at.ac.tuwien.ict.andropicar.rmcs.stm32.RMCSComponentManager
Continuously waits for data on the dataQueue and distributes that data to the correct RMCSControlComponents and SensorDataListeners, depending on what type of data they can process.
run() - Method in class at.ac.tuwien.ict.andropicar.rmcs.stm32.STM32SpiInterface
Continuously reads from its controlDataQueue and sends out all compatible IControlData over the SPI interface.
run() - Method in class at.ac.tuwien.ict.andropicar.rmcs.SyncPipe
